SlimeSpray.NAME: Slime Spray
SlimeSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply Slow to ALL enemies. NL Self-Retaining.

FollowThrough.NAME: Follow Through
FollowThrough.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played after an Attack. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Self-Retaining.

BiteCommand.NAME: Bite Command
BiteCommand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, two turns from now.

Backlash.NAME: Backlash
Backlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double the enemy's Block in damage. NL Self-Retaining.
Backlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals two and a half time the enemy's Block in damage. NL Self-Retaining.

WakeUpCall.NAME: Wake Up Call
WakeUpCall.DESCRIPTION: Will deal a !D! damage attack when the targeted enemy is Sleeping or Stunned.
WakeUpCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Will deal a !D! damage attack when the targeted enemy is Sleeping or Stunned.

PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Pre-emptive Strike
PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to Buff or Debuff, NL deal !D! damage.
PreemptiveStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to Buff or Debuff, NL deal !D! damage. NL Self-Retaining.

TimeDevouring.NAME: Time Devouring
TimeDevouring.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Degrades into Eat Time.
TimeDevouring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Degrades into Eat Time+.

TimeConsuming.NAME: Time Consuming
TimeConsuming.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Degrades into Bite of Time.
TimeConsuming.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Degrades Bite of Time+.

BiteofTime.NAME: Bite of Time
BiteofTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Degrades into Nibble.
BiteofTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Degrades into Nibble+.

Nibble.NAME: Nibble
Nibble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Switches into Bite of Time+.

WastingAway.NAME: Wasting Away
WastingAway.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When played, permanently decrease this card's Attack by !M!. NL Exhaust.

OverTime.NAME: Over Time
OverTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each card that you've Exhausted this combat, increase damage by !M!.

TiringSlam.NAME: Tiring Slam
TiringSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.
TiringSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card from ANY of your cards.

Rewind.NAME: Rewind
Rewind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If unblocked damage is dealt, place a card from your exhaust pile into your hand.
Rewind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If unblocked damage is dealt, place two cards from your exhaust pile into your hand.

Flay.NAME: Flay
Flay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, and they lose that much Strength for one turn. NL Exhaust.
Flay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, and they lose that much Strength for two turns. NL Exhaust.

Recurrance.NAME: Recurrence
Recurrance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply !M! additional Debuffs to each existing Debuff.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Recurrance will shorten the time needed until a delayed attack occurs, which can cause it to trigger instantly if it reaches zero.

OldTimer.NAME: Old Timer
OldTimer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each card that has been played this combat, increase damage by 1.

Keepsakes.NAME: Keepsakes
Keepsakes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL For each unblocked hit, retain one card this turn.

Sow.NAME: Sow
Sow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Switches into Reap.
Sow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Switches into Reap+.

Reap.NAME: Reap
Reap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Switches into Sow.
Reap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Switches into Sow+.

SenseKnock.NAME: Sense Knock
SenseKnock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shift ALL enemies to their next turn.
SenseKnock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shift ALL enemies to their next turn.

ASecondTooLate.NAME: A Second Too Late
ASecondTooLate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If unblocked, heal HP equal to the amount of Slow.

ThickGoo.NAME: Thick Goo
ThickGoo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Slow. NL Switches into Acidic Goo.
ThickGoo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Slow. NL Switches into Acidic Goo+.

AcidicGoo.NAME: Acidic Goo
AcidicGoo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Switches into Viscous Goo.
AcidicGoo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Switches into Viscous Goo+.

ViscousGoo.NAME: Viscous Goo
ViscousGoo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Switches into Thick Goo.
ViscousGoo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Switches into Thick Goo+.

RageCommand.NAME: Rage Command
RageCommand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, 3 turns from now.

HandsUp.NAME: Hands Up
HandsUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength at the end of their turn.

Stagnate.NAME: Stagnate
Stagnate.DESCRIPTION: Put an enemy to sleep for !M! turns. NL Suffer !M! Drawdown. NL Exhaust.

Presto.NAME: Presto
Presto.DESCRIPTION: Escape from a non-boss combat. Receive no rewards. NL Ethereal.
Presto.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Escape from a non-boss combat. Receive only gold rewards. NL Ethereal.

Grave.NAME: Grave
Grave.DESCRIPTION: Put target enemy to sleep for !M! turn. NL Exhaust.
Grave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put target enemy to sleep for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

Sospirando.NAME: Sospirando
Sospirando.DESCRIPTION: Apply Stun. NL Gain Stun. NL Exhaust.
Sospirando.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Stun to ALL enemies. NL Gain Stun. NL Exhaust.

Misterioso.NAME: Misterioso
Misterioso.DESCRIPTION: Play up to !M! cards randomly from your Exhaust pile and purge them. NL Will not play Status or Curse cards.

PatternShift.NAME: Pattern Shift
PatternShift.DESCRIPTION: [#FFFFFF]Shift the enemy to their next turn. NL Self-Retaining.
PatternShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL [#FFFFFF]Shift the enemy to their next turn. NL Self-Retaining.

TickedOff.NAME: Ticked Off
TickedOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain Haste. NL Self-Retaining.

Reiterate.NAME: Reiterate
Reiterate.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played after a Block. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Self-Retaining.

CoatedVibrissa.NAME: Coated Vibrissa
CoatedVibrissa.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Switches into Exo-coating.
CoatedVibrissa.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Switches into Exo-coating+.

Exocoating.NAME: Exo-coating
Exocoating.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [#EFC851]Plated Armor. NL Switches into Coated Vibrissa.
Exocoating.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [#EFC851]Plated Armor. NL Switches into Coated Vibrissa+.

ForgedGuard.NAME: Forged Guard
ForgedGuard.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain !M! Block. NL Degrades into Crafted Guard.
ForgedGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain !M! Block. NL Degrades into Crafted Guard+.

CraftedGuard.NAME: Crafted Guard
CraftedGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [#EFC851]Plated Armor. NL Degrades into Natural Guard.
CraftedGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [#EFC851]Plated Armor. NL Degrades into Natural Guard+.

NaturalGuard.NAME: Natural Guard
NaturalGuard.DESCRIPTION: After you take damage, gain !M! Block. NL Degrades into Watch Command.
NaturalGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After you take damage, gain !M! Block. NL Degrades into Watch Command+.

WatchCommand.NAME: Watch Command
WatchCommand.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next !M! turns.

Flashback.NAME: Flashback
Flashback.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! exhausted cards into your hand.
Flashback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! exhausted cards into your hand and upgrade them.

Cuckoo.NAME: Cuckoo
Cuckoo.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Self-Retaining.

EscortCommand.NAME: Escort Command
EscortCommand.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn gain !M! Block.

Pendulum.NAME: Pendulum
Pendulum.DESCRIPTION: Remove targeted enemy buffs for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Pendulum will cause a time paradox, causing the delayed attack to occur immediately AND be reapplied once the time dilation wears off.

TimelySolution.NAME: Timely Solution
TimelySolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Desummons Minions. NL Self-Retaining.

Analog.NAME: Analog
Analog.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, Dexterity, Artifact, or Retain for each enemy based on its intent.
Analog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, Dexterity, Artifact, or Retain for each enemy based on its intent. NL Self-Retaining.

ShortSighted.NAME: Short Sighted
ShortSighted.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Lose twice that in HP, four turns from now.

BackFourSeconds.NAME: Back Four Seconds
BackFourSeconds.DESCRIPTION: Restore !M!% of HP lost last turn. NL Self-Retaining. NL Exhaust.

Foolish.NAME: Foolish!
Foolish.DESCRIPTION: Set your HP to half your Max HP. NL Degrades into Short Sighted.
Foolish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Set your HP to two thirds your Max HP. NL Degrades into Short Sighted.

LockedMercury.NAME: Locked Mercury
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deals #g3 damage to ALL enemies at the start of your turn. NL #pShatters #pin #b5 #pturns
Deals #g5 damage to ALL enemies at the start of your turn. NL #pShatters #pin #b5 #pturns

LockedOrichalcum.NAME: Locked Orichalcum
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn without #yBlock, gain #g6 #yBlock. Works with other Orichalcums. NL #pShatters #pin #b5 #pturns
If you end your turn without #yBlock, gain #g9 #yBlock. Works with other Orichalcums. NL #pShatters #pin #b5 #pturns

LockedTurtyl.NAME: Locked Twirtle
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Slowed enemies begin with additional #g3 slow each turn. NL #pShatters #pin #b5 #pturns.
Applies #g3 slow to ALL enemies at the start of your turn. NL #pShatters #pin #b5 #pturns

LockedFlame.NAME: Locked Flame
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draws a random #yAttack card from your deck at the start of your turn. Won't shatter on its own.
#gChoose an #yAttack card from your deck at the start of your turn. Won't shatter on its own.

LockedLightning.NAME: Locked Lightning
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draws a random #ySkill card from your deck at the start of your turn. Won't shatter on its own.
#gChoose a #ySkill card from your deck at the start of your turn. Won't shatter on its own.

LockedTornado.NAME: Locked Tornado
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draws a random #yPower card from your deck at the start of your turn. Won't shatter on its own.
#gChoose a #yPower card from your deck at the start of your turn. Won't shatter on its own.

LockedMedicine.NAME: Locked Medicine
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a #yStatus card, #yDiscard it and draw a card. NL #pShatters #pin #b7 #pturns.
Whenever you draw a #yStatus or #yCurse card, #yDiscard it and draw a card. NL #pShatters #pin #b7 #pturns.

LockedPlans.NAME: Locked Plans
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain #g1 additional card each turn. NL #pShatters #pin #b4 #pturns.
Retain #g2 additional card each turn. NL #pShatters #pin #b4 #pturns.

LockedAnchor.NAME: Locked Anchor
LockedAnchor.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Unlocks an [#EFC851]Anchor Replica.
LockedAnchor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Unlocks an [#EFC851]Anchor+ Replica.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Just weighs you down. Timer counts up instead of down.
Timer counts up instead of down. On shattering, gain #b10 #yBlock.

LockedBell.NAME: Locked Bell
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Creates #g1 #yReplica and add #g1 curse to your draw pile at the start of each turn. NL #pShatters #pin #b3 #pturns.
Creates #g1 #yReplica and add #g1 curse to your draw pile at the start of each turn. NL #pShatters #pin #b4 #pturns.

LockedMawBank.NAME: Locked Maw Bank
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain #g12 gold if it survives combat without shattering. NL #pShatters #pin #b7 #pturns.
Gain #g16 gold if it survives combat without shattering. NL #pShatters #pin #b7 #pturns.

LockedAstrolabe.NAME: Locked Astrolabe
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your hand, and add a new random card to your hand and upgrade it. NL #pShatters #pin #b3 #pturns.
Exhaust a card from your hand, and choose a card to add to your hand and upgrade it. NL #pShatters #pin #b3 #pturns.

LockedCalendar.NAME: Locked Calendar
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deals #b52 damage to all enemies on shattering. NL #pShatters #pin #g7 #pturns.
Deals #b52 damage to all enemies on shattering. NL #pShatters #pin #g4 #pturns.

LockedWarPaint.NAME: Locked War Paint
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Each turn, upgrade a Skill in your hand for the rest of combat. NL #pShatters #pin #b4 #pturns.
Each turn, upgrade ALL Skills in your hand for the rest of combat. NL #pShatters #pin #b4 #pturns.

LockedWhetstone.NAME: Locked Whetstone
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Each turn, upgrade an Attack in your hand for the rest of combat. NL #pShatters #pin #b4 #pturns.
Each turn, upgrade ALL Attacks in your hand for the rest of combat. NL #pShatters #pin #b4 #pturns.

LockedScales.NAME: Locked Scales
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When receiving #yAttack damage, deals #b3 damage back. NL #pShatters #pin #b6 #pturns.
When receiving #yAttack damage, deals #b5 damage back. NL #pShatters #pin #b6 #pturns.

Tempo.NAME: Tempo
Tempo.DESCRIPTION: Returns to your hand as a permanently transformed card based on enemy intent.
Tempo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Returns to your hand as a permanently transformed upgraded card based on enemy intent.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Hover this card over an enemy to see what it will turn into.
There are fifteen different intents in the game, each with their own unique card that corresponds to the intent.

BeatsPerMinute.NAME: Beats Per Minute
BeatsPerMinute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills, permanently gain a card based on enemy intent. Exhaust.
BeatsPerMinute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills, permanently gain an upgraded card based on enemy intent. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Hover this card over an enemy to see what card you gain if they are killed.
There are fifteen different intents in the game, each with their own unique card that corresponds to the intent.

OldEchonomics.NAME: Echonomics
OldEchonomics.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn is played twice. NL Exhaust.
OldEchonomics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The last card you play each turn is played twice. NL Exhaust.

Echonomics.NAME: Echonomics
Echonomics.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next discounted card is duplicated into your hand and costs 0. NL Exhaust.
Echonomics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next discounted card is duplicated into your hand and costs 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Parity.NAME: Parity
Parity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage on even turns or gain !B! Block on odd turns.

MasterKey.NAME: Master Key
MasterKey.DESCRIPTION: Plays all Powers in your hand. NL Self-Retaining. NL Exhaust.
MasterKey.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Plays all Powers in your hand and discard Pile. NL Self-Retaining. NL Exhaust.

FeedbackCycle.NAME: Feedback Cycle
FeedbackCycle.DESCRIPTION: Add a Ward to your hand for each count of Haste you have.
FeedbackCycle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Wards to your hand, and an additional one for each count of Haste you have.

VestedLegacy.NAME: Vested Legacy
VestedLegacy.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Wards to your hand and shuffle 2 into your draw pile.
VestedLegacy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! upgraded Wards to your hand and shuffle 2 into your draw pile.

OldResonantCall.NAME: Resonant Call
OldResonantCall.DESCRIPTION: Play the first !M! Block cards in your draw pile that give less Block than you currently have. NL Exhaust.

ResonantCall.NAME: Resonant Call
ResonantCall.DESCRIPTION: Mimics the effect and cost of the last card you played.

OldClockandLoad.NAME: Clock and Load
OldClockandLoad.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increases for each [E] gained this combat. NL Exhaust.
OldClockandLoad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increases for each [E] gained this combat.

OldSpareTime.NAME: Spare Time
OldSpareTime.DESCRIPTION: For each subsequent [E] used this turn, add a Ward to your hand.
OldSpareTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For each subsequent [E] used this turn, add an upgraded Ward to your hand.

Echoward.NAME: Echoward
Echoward.DESCRIPTION: All subsequent cards played this turn also play a Ward.
Echoward.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All subsequent cards played this turn also play an upgraded Ward.

PrimeTime.NAME: Prime Time
PrimeTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card was retained, does twice the damage.

AlternateTimeline.NAME: Alternate Timeline
AlternateTimeline.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Choose a card from your draw pile and place it into your hand.
AlternateTimeline.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards. NL Choose !M! cards from your draw pile and place them into your hand.

Chronoelasticity.NAME: Chrono-elasticity
Chronoelasticity.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! times X Slow to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! times X Haste.

SpareTime.NAME: Spare Time
SpareTime.DESCRIPTION: Play X cards from the top of your deck. NL Exhaust.
SpareTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play X+1 cards from the top of your deck. NL Exhaust.

OldCrunchTime.NAME: Crunch Time
OldCrunchTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] for each Replica. NL Shatter all Replicas.

CrunchTime.NAME: Crunch Time
CrunchTime.DESCRIPTION: Shatter the newest Replica. NL Deal !D! damage for each turn on the countdown timer.

Fragmentalize.NAME: Fragmentalize
Fragmentalize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each replica. NL Shatter all Replicas. NL Exhaust.

Facsimile.NAME: Facsimile
Facsimile.DESCRIPTION: Create replicas of X of your eligible relics. NL Exhaust.
Facsimile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create replicas of X of your eligible relics.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Currently you will only replicate Rocks.
Replicas will be arbitrarily created for
Replicas will be arbitrarily created for X of the following relics:

OracleForm.NAME: Oracle Form
OracleForm.DESCRIPTION: Instead of drawing your hand, choose !M! cards from your draw pile.
OracleForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Instead of drawing your hand, choose !M! cards from your draw pile.

SpringForward.NAME: Spring Forward
SpringForward.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Switches into Fallback.
SpringForward.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Retain 1 card. NL Switches into Fallback+.

Fallback.NAME: Fallback
Fallback.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] NL Switches into Spring Forward. NL Exhaust.
Fallback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] NL Switches into Spring Forward+. NL Exhaust.

ClockandLoad.NAME: Clock and Load
ClockandLoad.DESCRIPTION: Increase each replica's countdown timer by !M!. NL Switches into Fast Forward.
ClockandLoad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase each replica's countdown timer by !M!. NL Switches into Fast Forward+.

FastForwardS.NAME: Fast Forward
FastForwardS.DESCRIPTION: Each replica counts down and plays !M! card from your draw pile. NL Switches into Clock and Load.
FastForwardS.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each replica counts down and plays !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Switches into Clock and Load.

Break.NAME: Break
Break.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL All enemies gain !M! Block.

FormalWear.NAME: Formal Wear
FormalWear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Unlocks a Rock Replica.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deals #g1 damage to a random enemy when it shatters. NL #pShatters #pin #b4 #pturns.
Deals #g1 damage to a random enemy when it shatters. NL Rare hats are more likely. NL #pShatters #pin #b4 #pturns.

Dizzy.NAME: Dizzy
Dizzy.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Confuses your hand when drawn.

HandsUpB.NAME: Hands Up
HandsUpB.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of the round, deal damage equal to your remaining Block.

HandsUpC.NAME: Clock and Load
HandsUpC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Each turn, increase this card's damage by !M! for this combat.

HandsUpD.NAME: Strengths Up
HandsUpD.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength and gains 8 Strength next turn.

HandsUpE.NAME: Ouch Up
HandsUpE.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength, you and the enemy take damage for each negative Strength they have each turn.

HandsUpF.NAME: Cards Up
HandsUpF.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards, and deal !D! damage for each.

HandsUpG.NAME: Draws Up
HandsUpG.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw one less card next turn.
